item.description:
.Great food, a passion for excellent service and a fun, homey setting make Joey Garlic's in Newington the perfect destination for a gigantic Sicilian Salad, a delectable hamburger, a sumputous pasta dish, and it WON'T break the bank.

The reviews say it all...
" Joey Garlic's is the perfect restaurant for value, service and fantastic food." They offer generous portions of great food at reasonable prices.


Besides those fabulous pasta dishes, they offer New Haven-style brick oven pizza, with a crust similar in texture to rustic peasant bread. They top most of their pies with fresh-snipped basil and use the very finest finest extra virgin olive oil.

So come out and join us for some GREAT Italian fare. Next stp...Tuscany!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Terri, or Meetup....cell is 203-808-5829
item.why: The food is delicious...the company superb...what more can we ask for???

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Italian Night @ Joey Garlic's in Newington!
